name: OctopusPack
description: Package your application into a NuPkg or Zip file.
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: PackageId
inputs.label: Package ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the package. e.g. MyCompany.App

inputs.name: PackageVersion
inputs.label: Package Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the package; must be a valid [SemVer](http://semver.org/) version; defaults to a timestamp-based version.

inputs.name: SourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder containing the files and folders to package. Defaults to working directory.

inputs.name: OutputPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory into which the generated package will be written. Defaults to working directory.

inputs.name: NuGetAuthor
inputs.label: Author
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add an author to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: NuGetTitle
inputs.label: Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add a title to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: NuGetDescription
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add a description to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: NuGetReleaseNotes
inputs.label: Release Notes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add release notes to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: NuGetReleaseNotesFile
inputs.label: Release Notes File
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file containing release notes to be added to the NuGet package metadata.

inputs.name: Include
inputs.label: Include
inputs.helpMarkDown: File patterns to include, relative to the root path. e.g. /bin/*.dll

inputs.name: Overwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allow an existing package of the same ID and version to be overwritten.
